title: Time-Traveled Tales: The 2012 Origins Fiction Anthology Volume 1
description: A collection of stories about time, travel, and various combinations thereof.This volume was prepared for the 2012 Origins Game Fair, held in Columbus, Ohio, May 30 - June 3, 2012.The Printing is limited to 500 copies.Contains:Replay Value, Aaron AllstonLast Man on Earth, Maxwell Alexander DrakeSlug, Janine K.
